text: Mozzarella sticks are pieces of battered or breaded mozzarella. It is a deep fried food. In the United States, it is often served in restaurants as an appetizer and as food served in pubs. It is shaped like a stick. Mozzarella sticks are often served with tomato or marinara sauce. They may also be served with plum sauce, jalape√±o jelly, barbecue sauce, honey mustard sauce, and ranch dressing. Other types of cheese may be fried, such as provolone, cheddar, and American. ==References== Category:American food Category:Cheese dishes
title: Mozzarella sticks
